white: Losing your virginity at an abandoned mental asylum.
Crawling away from a killer instead of running like a normal person.
50% off organs on The Deep Web.
Aliens that look like human females but painted green.
Human shaped holes in the side of the mountain.
Whenever this message manages to appear in your dream, please wake up. We miss you.
Losing consciousness and floating through space for all eternity.
Dying alone and afraid while wandering the Catacombs.
Throwing a baby off of a bridge for the drama of it all.
Big Foot's gay cousin, the Yeti.
My boyfriend, bound in rope and screaming.
Being bitten by a werewolf and turning into a Corgi every full moon.
Buying a haunted doll on Craigslist for $1.00.
What happens at a campsite full of teenagers, STAYS at a campsite full of teenagers.
Sacrificing a goat and dancing around a tree naked.
Some loser in a hockey mask.
A gathering of black cats because all the white cats are racist.
A succubus baby mama wanting child support.
A monkey jacked up on dope.
A hollowed out baby filled with drugs.
Three white guys asking a ghost personal questions in English despite being in a non-English speaking country.
That one dumb chick that always survives the horror movie.
A little girl that is secretly a 33 year old woman.
"I Have No Mouth and I Must Scream.".
Getting a Candy Crush request from your dead mother's Facebook.
When you can't tell if you were invited to a seance or a KKK meeting.
A mouth full of sharp teeth.
Clothing made out of human flesh.
When you and bae get abducted at the same time.
Being the father of an alien hybrid.
The sheer eeriness of hospitals late at night.
Entering a haunted asylum to capture something on camera for a film festival.
Aliens with a weakness toward water traveling to a planet that is 71% water.
Gathering your dead relatives for one last selfie.
Clown statues that turn out to be a real, actual person.
Filling an island with dolls to appease the ghost of a small child.
Girls who ask for a ride but vanish before you get there.
Those Youtube videos that get mysteriously deleted.
The Loch Ness Monster's long neck.
Hide and seek with a doll.
White kids entering a bunker that clearly shouldn't be entered.
Going further into the haunted tunnel with the creepy noises because you need the Youtube views.
That one episode of Courage the Cowardly Dog. (You know the one...).
Hearing a knock on the window on the 9th floor.
Mixing pop rocks with soda and spazzing in a McDonald's parking lot.
Ghosts so fake you can see right through them.
Whatever the fuck is at the bottom of the ocean.
A sea monster that looks oddly like a penis.
Having sex in a graveyard at night.
Kicking that bitch from The Grudge.
Sneaking into a body farm to have sex with the corpses.
Searching for your brother in the basement where your dad has been digging to Hell for years now.
People playing Cards Against Humanity and not noticing the dark creature slowly inching behind them.
Nosy ass people in paintings that follow you with their eyes.
Being worshipped as a goddess and convincing your followers to kill each other.
